resources.string:
PayPoll lets you earn real money and airtime credit by completing fast, easy tasks on your mobile phone. PeoPoll tasks include taking short surveys, uploading pictures, and more. Every task you complete adds to your PeoPoll credit, which can be redeemed through bKash, Rocket or airtime credit at any time. PayPoll information is anonymously collected, and we will never share your personal identifiable information. 

 WHO we are and WHAT we do: We are Mindscape Limited – a market research company. We capture consumer’s behavior, demand, liking, disliking and their thoughts. With these information – we help our clients to design and modify their products and services that people want. Our client list includes the top local and multinational conglomerates. From telecom service providers to daily household items manufacturers; from bank to super stores; we help diverse types of clients to serve you better every day. 

 WHAT you will have to do: All you have to do is to let your opinion know through our app – PayPoll… There are small surveys where you’ll be asked very basic questions about yourself, your recent activities, your thoughts on different product or service you may have availed or know about. These surveys are usually takes very little time (approx. 5 to 8 minutes) to complete. They are also very easy to use and interactive. Every survey will notify you an estimated time and an incentive amount at the beginning. Once you successfully complete a survey, the incentive amount will be credited in to your PayPoll wallet immediately. You may redeem your balance anytime you want – as bKash/Rocket balance or airtime. Once you submit redeem request, your requested balance will be delivered within next 24 hours. Please read our Incentive Encashment Terms and Conditions for details. There is usually no right or wrong answer. You’ll only be asked to give answer you think is appropriate. But there could be some surveys which are not meant for you. If you start a survey which is not designed for you - you will be notified in a minute or two; and your survey will end immediately. Please note that we will not disburse any incentive for incomplete surveys, termination or if you provide fake information. Please refer to our Survey Participation Guideline for detail information. Moreover, there will be small tasks you will find in our app time to time. Completing those tasks will also give you lucrative incentives. For example – you may ask to send photos of your nearby billboard, or picture of a store you go for shopping. Please note that using our app requires an active internet connection. You may connect using mobile data or Wi-Fi; whichever is convenient for you. However, the app consumes very small amount of data; and most of the time you will be able to earn more than you have spent.


 Secrecy: The app collects all the information anonymously and send through a secured connection (SSL: Secured Socket Layer). Once we collect the information you have provided, we analyze it in a way that it will never be possible to see your information separately. Note that we collect similar data from thousands of our other users too. And when it is finally processed – the data is clubbed in whole or in groups; never at an individual level. We will never share your personal information with anyone. In fact we have developed our system in a way that we will never be able to see your personal information. We also will never share your contact details with anyone. We will never send you any ad or promotional offers or will never ask you to purchase any product or service. There will be absolutely no such incident where you will be asked to provide any money to Mindscape or any of its partnering organization or person in order to use our app or to redeem your balance. Our users are welcome to visit our data center to be ensured regarding our data security system. Please connect to our customer care representatives though the phone numbers and email address provided in our contact details. Mindscape Limited (Owner of PayPoll) will be liable for any of your personal information leakage – if you can provide sufficient proofs in front of the appropriate judicial authority; and the court impeach Mindscape Limited guilty. Mindscape Limited is a Private Limited Company formed under the Company Act 1994 of Bangladesh. As a market research agency, it abides by the ESOMAR code of conduct – an International regulation for conducting survey and protect respondents’ confidentiality.
Complete easy survey and earn real money.
These surveys are short, completely anonymous and you can participate from anywhere and anytime
You can easily redeem your earning through mobile wallet (bKash, Rocket) or TalkTime

resources.string:
Please Provide Authentic Information In Order To Use This App. 
All Information Will Be Kept Safe. 

Do You Agree?

Why you should provide us your number? 

Your number will remain as your unique ID. 
We can only send money to your number which you will register here 

It might be talk time, bKash* or Rocket*. 

*Note: You can only redeem money through bKash or Rocket if you have an existing active bKash or Rocket account registered through the mobile number you have entered here.
Please give us your full name.
Please use the attached Terms and Conditions doc
We will only see to which operator you send or receive SMS from. We never see the text of the message or the full number of the sender/receiver.
We will only check to which operator do you call/sms or receive call/sms from. We never see the entire number but only the operator code. Only first 4 digit of the number can be seen by us.
This will help us to know where you visit, thus we can send you location based survey requests.
Select bKash/Rocket if and only if your number is already registered with bKash/Rocket.
Your request will be processed in next 24 hours.\n\nThanks for using PayPoll.

Answer simple questions everyday to earn BDT 5. 

The questions are related with the media you consume everyday (i.e. TV, Newspaper, etc.) 

For completing this survey everyday for 30 days, you will receive addition BDT 50 after 30 days.
Select occupation from the list that best suits you.
Select the last achieved degree. \n\ni.e. If you have completed HSC and currently enrolled for a bachelor degree, please select “HSC and equivalent”
A Chief Wage Earner is the person who earns majority in your family.
Select the Occupation that best suits. If retired – please select the last job he/she was engaged in.

Select the last achieved degree. 

i.e. If the Chief Wage Earner have completed HSC and currently enrolled for a bachelor degree, 
please select “HSC and equivalent”
No se pudo revocar el acceso
No se pudo autenticar con Firebase

Here are few examples: The Intellectual Property disclosure will inform users that the contents, logo and other visual media you created is your property and is protected by copyright laws. A Termination clause will inform that users’ accounts on your website and mobile app or users’ access to your website and mobile (if users can’t have an account with you) can be terminated in case of abuses or at your sole discretion. A Governing Law will inform users which laws govern the agreement. This should the country in which your company is headquartered or the country from which you operate your website and mobile app. A Links To Other Web Sites clause will inform users that you are not responsible for any third party websites that you link to. This kind of clause will generally inform users that they are responsible for reading and agreeing (or disagreeing) with the Terms and Conditions or Privacy Policies of these third parties. If your website or mobile app allows users to create content and make that content public to other users, a Content section will inform users that they own the rights to the content they have created.The “Content” clause usually mentions that users must give you (the website or mobile app developer) a license so that you can share this content on your website/mobile app and to make it available to other users.Because the content created by users is public to other users, a DMCA notice clause (or Copyright Infringement ) section is helpful to inform users and copyright authors that, if any content is found to be a copyright infringement, you will respond to any DMCA takedown notices received and you will take down the content. A Limit What Users Can Do clause can inform users that by agreeing to use your service, they’re also agreeing to not do certain things. This can be part of a very long and thorough list in your Terms and Conditions agreements so as to encompass the most amount of negative uses. Here’s how 500px lists its prohibited activities.
